uk.co.silentsoftware.config
Class OptionsObject

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.silentsoftware.config.OptionsObject

public class OptionsObject
extends java.lang.Object

The backing object behind the OptionDialog, holding the particular user configuration.

Field Summary
private static AttributeStrategy attributeMode
          The method of choosing the correct attribute colour
private static AttributeStrategy[] attributeModes
          Attribute favouritism choice - when colours need to be changed to a two colour attribute what is favoured?

          The chosen basic loader
